001/**
002 * This file sets up the connection to the database
003 * @author Shruti Oruganti
004 */
005package src.database;
006
007import java.sql.*;
008
009/**
010 * This class provides a function to connect to the database stored in db_setup
011 */
012public class db_connect {
013    private static final String DB_URL = "jdbc:postgresql://csce-315-db.engr.tamu.edu/gang_82_db";
014
015    /**
016     * This function sets up the connection to the database
017     * @return the connection to the database
018     * @throws SQLException
019     */
020    public static Connection getConnection() throws SQLException {
021        try {
022            Class.forName("org.postgresql.Driver");
023        } catch (ClassNotFoundException e) {
024            e.printStackTrace();
025        }
026        return DriverManager.getConnection(DB_URL, db_setup.user, db_setup.pswd);
027
028    }
029}
